import { type Assign, ToggleGroup } from '@ark-ui/solid'
import type { ComponentProps } from 'solid-js'
import { toggleGroup } from 'styled-system/recipes'
import type { HTMLStyledProps } from 'styled-system/types'
import { createStyleContext } from '~/lib/create-style-context'

const { withProvider, withContext } = createStyleContext(toggleGroup)

export type RootProviderProps = ComponentProps<typeof RootProvider>
export const RootProvider = withProvider<
  Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, ToggleGroup.RootProviderProps>
>(ToggleGroup.RootProvider, 'root')

export type RootProps = ComponentProps<typeof Root>
export const Root = withProvider<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'div'>, ToggleGroup.RootProps>>(
  ToggleGroup.Root,
  'root',
)

export type ItemProps = ComponentProps<typeof Item>
export const Item = withContext<Assign<HTMLStyledProps<'button'>, ToggleGroup.ItemProps>>(
  ToggleGroup.Item,
  'item',
)

export {
  ToggleGroupContext as Context,
  type ToggleGroupContextProps as ContextProps,
} from '@ark-ui/solid'
